gobblin.runtime.api

Interface GobblinInstanceEnvironment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Instrumentable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GobblinInstanceDriver, GobblinInstanceLauncher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGobblinInstanceDriverImpl, JobLauncherExecutionDriver.Launcher, SimpleGobblinInstanceEnvironment, StandardGobblinInstanceDriver, StandardGobblinInstanceDriver.Builder, StandardGobblinInstanceLauncher, StandardGobblinInstanceLauncher.Builder

    public interface GobblinInstanceEnvironment
extends Instrumentable
    Defines Gobblin a set of standard configuration features for a gobblin instance. Passing an instance of this interface can be used to configure Gobbling components like JobCatalog, JobSpecScheduler or JobExecutionLauncher.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SharedResourcesBroker<GobblinScopeTypes> getInstanceBroker()
      The SharedResourcesBroker for this instance.
      String getInstanceName()
      The instance name (for debugging/logging purposes)
      org.slf4j.Logger getLog()
      The logger used by this instance
      Configurable getSysConfig()
      The global system-wide configuration, typically provided by the GobblinInstanceLauncher
